# SNResultsObserving

**Protocol**

The interface your app implements to receive the results of an analysis request.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol SNResultsObserving : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Handling Requests

- **request(_:didProduce:)**: Provides a new analysis result to your app with the specified time range.
- **SNResult**: A protocol that represents sound analysis results.
- **request(_:didFailWithError:)**: Provides any errors that occur during processing of the request.
- **requestDidComplete(_:)**: Notifies your app when the analysis request completes normally.

## Managing Requests

- **add(_:withObserver:)**: Adds a new analysis request to the audio file analyzer.
- **SNRequest**: A protocol that represents sound analysis requests.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes an existing request from the audio file analyzer.
- **removeAllRequests()**: Removes all the sound analysis requests from the audio file analyzer.

- NSObjectProtocol
